name: collections::btree::navigate::<impl collections::btree::node::NodeRef<BorrowType, K, V, collections::btree::node::marker::LeafOrInternal>>::upper_bound

collections::btree::search::<impl collec.doc: Clone of `find_lower_bound_edge` for the upper bound.

collections::btree::node::Handle::<colle.doc: Checks whether the underlying node is an `Internal` node or a `Leaf` node.

Finds the node pointed to by this edge.

 The method name assumes you picture trees with the root node on top.

 `edge.descend().ascend().unwrap()` and `node.ascend().unwrap().descend()` should
 both, upon success, do nothing.

doc:
Returns the leaf edge corresponding to the last point at which the
 given bound is true.
